TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Maurice_Bernard_Sendak, title = Maurice_Bernard_Sendak, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Maurice_Bernard_Sendak} }

S.FORM: Maurice Bernard Sendak nu Amuhuan ngangan a kamu, Mulisis·bunade·sangdake nu Sakizaya a kamu. kakiliman Mulisis·bunade·sangdake (Amuhuan a kamu: Maurice Bernard Sendak, 1928 mihcaan enem a bulad cacay a bataan tu demiad－2012 mihcaan lima a bulad waluay a demiad), nilecuhen i Amuhan a New York City Brooklyn, namisulit tu nu wawaay a sulit atu sikulitay. u sakaydihan nisulitan i 1963 mihcaan sulitan ku sakatalawanay a aaduban nu niyadu' paadih, uyni nisulitan sumaden malaiga tu aadihan "sakatalawanay a aaduban nu niyadu' ". kina limaay makaala tu nu Amuhuanay a nipikulit tu satalawkaway nu kasenengan katikecang (Caldecott Medal). yu mahida u sayaway tu cinida makaala tu guojiantusheng tu nu kulitan a kawlah (Hans Christian Andersen Award) nu Amuhuanay a tademaw. nilacul nu sayaway a nikaudip masacacayay a maudip mabelec sangdake i 2012 mihcaan limaay a bulad walu a demiad tu sananal siimelangay cinida tu tangahay a imelang, caay pakademec tu adada', sisa mangalep ku imelang sa, patay sa tu i Amuhuan kangnadikecu tanbuli , waluay idaw ku tulu a mihcaan ku nikaudip nida. misasulitay

Maorice Bernard Sendak no Amohoan ngangan a kamo, Molisis·bonade·sangdake no Sakizaya a kamo. kakiliman Molisis·bonade·sangdake (Amohoan a kamo: Maorice Bernard Sendak, 1928 mihcaan enem a bolad cacay a bataan to demiad－2012 mihcaan lima a bolad waloay a demiad), nilecohen i Amohan a New York City Brooklyn, namisolit to no wawaay a solit ato sikolitay. o sakaydihan nisolitan i 1963 mihcaan solitan ko sakatalawanay a aadoban no niyado' paadih, oyni nisolitan somaden malaiga to aadihan "sakatalawanay a aadoban no niyado' ". kina limaay makaala to no Amohoanay a nipikolit to satalawkaway no kasenengan katikecang (Caldecott Medal). yo mahida o sayaway to cinida makaala to goojiantosheng to no kolitan a kawlah (Hans Christian Andersen Award) no Amohoanay a tademaw. nilacol no sayaway a nikaodip masacacayay a maodip mabelec sangdake i 2012 mihcaan limaay a bolad walo a demiad to sananal siimelangay cinida to tangahay a imelang, caay pakademec to adada', sisa mangalep ko imelang sa, patay sa to i Amohoan kangnadikeco tanboli , waloay idaw ko tolo a mihcaan ko nikaodip nida. misasolitay
